Steel Plant - Nador

Scrap Sorting

Scrap metal will be brought in by lorry and stored in the large, open scrap sorting area. A large gantry crane will be used for moving the scrap around.

Once prepared (sorted by type, and large items cut to size) the scrap is set to the first stage of the steel making process via a conveyer system. This conveyor is also used to preheat the scrap.
